opendial.plugins

Class ATTSpeech

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.plugins.ATTSpeech
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class ATTSpeech
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module
    Plugin to access the AT&T Speech API for both speech recognition and synthesis. The plugin necessitates the specification of an application ID and secret [see the README file for the plugin for details]. The API offers cloud-based services for AT&T's WATSON system.

    To enhance the recognition accuracy, it is recommended to provide the system with a recognition grammar, which can be specified in the GRXML format.

    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-11-09 23:30:34 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
